name: Rampant Windows
description:
Made for LD42 with the theme Running out of Space

Rampant Windows is a chaotic game in which you must manage several different mini-games as they pop up. It is important to manage your space by clearing each window as fast as possible so that you don't get overrun. The game includes 10 smaller mini-games to manage as well as a variety of pop-up ads to get in your way.
